thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core
Class Matrix3

java.lang.Object
  thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.Matrix3

public class Matrix3
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements three-dimensional matrix. MxM, where M=3. This matrix actually is array which is represented the following indexes: 

 0 3 6
 1 4 7
 2 5 8

Author:
thothbot

Constructor Summary
Matrix3()
          Default constructor will make empty three-dimensional matrix.

          Transpose the current matrix where its rows will be the columns or its columns are the rows of the current matrix.
